descriptionHtml:
Out of boredom and my love for the Tropical Skyrim mod, I created 9 brightly colored Argonians to add to the atmosphere. Three are archers, three are mages, and three are melee. They level up with you. You can find them all in Whiterun, in The Bannered Mare. Perhaps I should have put a few in Riverwood?

My first mod, so please bear with any bugs and let me know your feedback. I'll try to add better video soon.

[b]Required mods:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]

[b]Recommended mods:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Tropical Skyrim[/url] - highly recommended for atmosphere!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/981/?]Drachis Argonians[/url] - a fabulous retexture of the male Argonians - [i][b]As seen in all screenies except the first![/b][/i]
ksArgonianWarpaint - followers were created with additional warpaints, however, I could not get them to work in my own game??

[b]The line up:[/b]
Wrath-Maw - An archer from Morrowind come to forge his own path after some revenge. He wishes to find a new clan to call his own.
Saber-Horn - A brawler (possible bug, supposed to be one-handed) who wears her late husband's armor, and punches people in his memory.
Fen-Ranger - An archer who once led a band of bandits, now seeking repentance among the very people she raided.
Smoke-Lots - A shaman who uses the forces of ice and fire to turn his enemies to smoke. He likes to experiment with alchemy.
Blue-Fire - A mage who conjures and controls fire incarnate. She studied at The College of Winterhold for years.
Swift-Strike - A large youth who wields a greatsword with courage, fighting in his parents honor. He vows to hunt the assassin down and avenge them.
Hidden-Claw - An archer who boasts he comes from a line of Shadow-Scale descendents.
Shock-Shadow - A shock destruction mage who once apprenticed to a mad necromancer. She killed him and turned his experiments to ash.
Marsh-Walker - Wielder of Volendrung, raised by Orcs, slayer of Daedra. He has seen many battles.

Changelog
--------------
2/1 - Removed Alduin leftover from outside Whiterun
1/22/14 - Fixed grayface bug
author: Poplockgrimlock
